\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{database.permissiongrouptable.postfix}
\label{configuration:DatabasePermissiongrouptablePostfix}
\ClearAPI
The postfix for a database table to be recognized as a permission group table for another table. E.g. the postfix is "\_PG" and the table the permissions should be applied to is named "ADDRESSES", the table "ADDRESSES\_PG" would be recognized as a table containing information about the permissions to access table "ADDRESSES". Valid values are all strings which can be used as table names.

\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{database.permissiongrouptable.postfix}}]
database.permissiongrouptable.postfix=\_PG
\end{lstlisting}
